name: ebi.search.mcp
description: MCP server exposing EMBL-EBI Search and Summary (S4) REST APIs, including global search, domain search, entry retrieval, cross-references, autocomplete, analytics, and biological summaries.

tools.name: search_all
tools.description: Search across all EMBL-EBI indexed domains.

tools.name: search_domain
tools.description: Search within a specific EMBL-EBI domain (e.g. UniProt, Ensembl, Literature).

tools.name: get_entry
tools.description: Retrieve full metadata for one or more entries from a domain.

tools.name: xref_targeted
tools.description: Retrieve cross-references from a source entry to a specific target domain.

tools.name: xref_all
tools.description: Retrieve all cross-references for a given entry across all linked domains.

tools.name: xref_domain
tools.description: Discover which domains are cross-referenced by a given source domain.

tools.name: seqtool_results
tools.description: Search results produced by EMBL-EBI sequence analysis tools.

tools.name: more_like_this_same_domain
tools.description: Find biologically similar entries within the same domain.

tools.name: more_like_this_cross_domain
tools.description: Find biologically related entries in a different target domain.

tools.name: summary_suggestions
tools.description: Get suggested biological summary terms using the EBI Summary (S4) API.

tools.name: summary_identification
tools.description: Resolve and identify mixed or ambiguous biological identifiers.
